/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of buildings and trees that add a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's constant movement and energy. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene.
